page.title: 05Youth and Age,Tiptree
page.content: I have interviewed six people,four of whom were boys,aged eleven,eleven, eleven and ten.When I questioned the boys about Tiptree,two of them said they disliked school,and the other two said that they didn't like the fact that Tiptree has not got a swimming pool.While the two older people I interviewed said it had grown too much for their liking,everyone else I interviewed said they were happy living in Tiptree.Also three out the four boys said when I asked them the question "What do you like about Tiptree, in general?"They answered that they liked the Sports Centre best of all.
